abstract: The Russian billionaire Roman A. Abramovich agreed on Tuesday to buy a $1.5 billion stake in Norilsk Nickel, the world’s largest producer of nickel and palladium.
lead_paragraph: The Russian billionaire Roman A. Abramovich agreed on Tuesday to buy a $1.5 billion stake in Norilsk Nickel, the world’s largest producer of nickel and palladium. The deal, which will give Mr. Abramovich a 5.9 percent holding in Norilsk Nickel, ends a longstanding feud between the mining company’s wealthy shareholders. Read more »

headline.main: Russian Billionaire to Buy $1.5 Billion Stake in Norilsk Nickel
